ML-MedImage
Framework to evaluation of automatic Multi-Label annotation of two-dimensional Medical Image

This document is the API specification for this framework.

This framework provide a way to use the features extract techniques and multi-labels learners to automatic classification of two-dimensional medical images. Its methods were tested with the images from IRMA-Project available in:

  • http://irma-project.org/

This framework uses the java libraries from:

  • - ImageJ - Image Processing and Analysis in Java;
  • - Texture Classification Using Local Binary Patterns (LBP features);
  • - LIRE - Lucene Image REtrieval (EHD and Gabor features);
  • - Stephan Saalfeld - ImageJ Plugins - JavaSIFT (SIFT features);
  • - JAMA - A Java Matrix Package (package needed in JavaSIFT);
  • - Mulan - A Java Library for Multi-Label Learning;
  • - Weka 3 - Data Mining Software in Java;
  • - Java-based solution for XML data from Java code.

For more information, see

  • [1] VILLANI, L. (2013). Anotação Automática de Imagens Médicas Bidimensionais por meio de Classificação Multirrótulo. Dissertação de Mestrado. UFABC, Santo André/SP.

BibTex:

@mastersthesis{dissertacao-leonardo-villani:2013,
   author = {Leonardo Villani},
   title = {Anotação Automática de Imagens Médicas Bidimensionais por meio de Classificação Multirrótulo},
   school = {Universidade Federal do ABC},
   type = {Dissertação de Mestrado},
   year = {2013}
}

Packages 
Package Description
br.eti.villani Contain the classes with the steps descripting in [1].
br.eti.villani.util Contain the auxiliar classes to run the experiments.
